alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 4:57PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT BERNALILLO COUNTY THROUGH 530 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Albuquerque, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Albuquerque, Los Ranchos De Albuquerque, South Valley, Carnuel, Canoncito in Bernalillo County, Cedar Crest, and North Valley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 148 and 173. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 218 and 230. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
